REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2651 reute r f BC-UNITED-BRANDS-<UB>-SE 10-20 0083

TEXT.TITLE: UNITED BRANDS <UB> SEES 3RD QTR NET UP
TEXT.BODY: United Brands Co said it expects to report substantially improved earnings for the third quarter over the year-ago 4,300,000 dlrs or 26 cts per share. The company also said it has repurchased 695,000 common shares for about 28 mln dlrs from affiliate <Great American Communications Co>. The company said it has authorized the repurchase of an additional 750,000 common shares in market or private transactions from time to time. Reuter
